name: nfsb4ALT
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: -| wb(w0, wa(wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1))))

stmt.origin: mpg(s2, wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)), wnf(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w1)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w1)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s2, wnf(s0, w1)), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0)))
-| wb(w0, wa(wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wa(wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w1))))

comment: Alternate version of ~ nfsb4 . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
